remarks: Value of the endomorphism division ring unit.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Oct-2013.)
statement:
erng1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
erng1.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng1.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng1.d $e |- D = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng1.r $e |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> D e. Ring ) $.
erng1lem $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( 1r ` D ) = ( _I |` T ) ) $.
